tns:patch.author: Alex
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mode_of_payment_capital_recurrent; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mode_of_payment_capital_recurrent AS SELECT distinct f.amp_activity_id, CASE cv.category_value WHEN 'Salaries and Wages' THEN 'Recurrent' WHEN 'Goods or Services' THEN 'Recurrent' WHEN 'Minor Capital' THEN 'Capital' WHEN 'Capital Development' THEN 'Capital' ELSE 'Capital/Recurrent not selected' END, cv.id AS id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, f.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, f.agreement as agreement_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_funding f, amp_category_value cv WHERE f.mode_of_payment_category_va=cv.id;
